name: sierra-library

scripts.build: npm run build:prod && npm run build:dev && cpx 'src/**/*.*' ./lib
scripts.build:dev: node-sass --include-path scss src/index.scss dist/sierra.css && postcss --use autoprefixer dist/sierra.css -d dist/
scripts.build:prod: node-sass --include-path scss src/index.scss dist/sierra.min.css  --output-style compressed && postcss --use autoprefixer dist/sierra.min.css -d dist/
